courseInfo.courseTitle: Renewable Energy & Emerging Trends in Electronics
courseInfo.subjectName: Renewable Energy & Emerging Trends in Electronics

rationale: Learning about Renewable Energy and Emerging Trends in Electronics is essential, as these fields play a crucial role in shaping the future of technology, sustainability, and global development. Comprehending sustainable energy sources like solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal energy is essential to mitigating climate change and minimizing the ecological consequences of energy generation. The field of electronics is dynamic and constantly evolving. The utilization of the newest technologies in electronics is facilitated by keeping up with new trends, thereby promoting innovation across a range of industries.
competency: Technical proficiency in understanding renewable energy technologies and emerging electronic trends, honing their capabilities in energy systems and cutting-edge electronics

courseOutcomes.description: Understand the fundamental principles of renewable energy systems and their applications
Stay informed about current trends and innovations in Smart Materials and systems
Gain knowledge of Emerging Trends in Electronic Components
Develop basic idea of Trends in interfacing & Computing

practicalExercises.description: Understand the Block Diagram of a Home Solar rooftop system
Study E-vehicle kit with various parts of electric vehicle & compare specifications of different EVs
Study wearable systems like Smart Watches, Smart glasses & wearable health monitoring systems
Understand the structure of a drone
Understand the block diagram of a generic biometric system
Study various AR-VR gadgets and technologies
Install Raspberry Pi OS on your SD card using Raspberry Pi imager, Setup and configure Raspberry Pi computer
Interface/Simulate LED, button and buzzer with Raspberry Pi
Interface PIR, temperature and humidity sensors with Raspberry Pi
Demonstrate a burglar alarm system using Raspberry Pi
Getting started with machine learning using tools like machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn or TensorFlow

Create a cartoon that smiles if you type nice things to it and cries if you type bad things to it. (Train, test and implement text classification machine learning algorithm using machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn or TensorFlow)

Make a dancing panda that gets shy and stops dancing if it sees you looking. (Train, test and implement image classification machine learning algorithm using machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn or TensorFlow)

Make a cartoon that learns to recognize Gujarati/other languages. (Train, test and implement sound classification machine learning algorithm using machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn or TensorFlow)

performanceIndicators.indicator: Question answer or Writing steps exercise

hardware: E-vehicle kit to study various parts of electric vehicle
Smart gadgets like smartwatches, goggles etc.
software: Machine learning software and hardware system

affectiveDomainOutcomes: Development of positive attitudes, values, and motivations toward sustainable energy practices and technological advancements.
Appreciation for the importance of renewable energy sources and the role they play in addressing environmental challenges.
Cultivate a sense of responsibility and concern for the environment, emphasizing the impact of energy choices on ecosystems and global climate patterns.
Foster an innovative mindset by recognizing the significance of emerging trends in electronics and their potential to revolutionize the energy landscape.

unitOutcomes.description: Describe and prioritize renewable energy
Discuss different types of Renewable Energy Sources
Explain Emerging renewable energy technologies & innovations
Explain Solar Photovoltaic effect & Principle of photovoltaic conversion
List the different types of Solar Cell
Understand the Block Diagram of a Home Solar rooftop system
Illustrate a Block diagram of an electric vehicle & EV architecture
Describe the types of EV
Discuss different Energy sources for EV
Know hybrid energy sources

topics.title: Introduction to Renewable Energy and its Importance
Introduction to Solar Cell, Photovoltaic effect, Principle of photovoltaic conversion
Block diagram of Solar rooftop system
Introduction to Electric Vehicle Technology and its Types

unitOutcomes.description: Understand Nanotechnology
List Nanotechnology applications
Know various wearable technologies
Explain UAVs or drones
Discuss the applications of UAVs or drones
Describe the working principle of a drone
Describe the Block diagram of a drone and its major components
Understand various Smart Systems
Illustrate Block diagrams of Smart Systems like water pollution monitoring, Street light control and monitoring, Health monitoring and homes & Gadgets

topics.title: Wearable Technology
subtopics: Smart Watches and Smart glasses, or wearable health monitoring system

topics.title: Introduction to UAVs or drones and their applications
Smart Systems Case Study
subtopics: Smart Street light control and monitoring

unitOutcomes.description: Understand organic electronics
Compare between Inorganic and Organic electronics
Explain the advantages of Organic electronics
Explain different types of organic components: OLED, OFET, OPVD
Understand Biometrics
Explain Biometric systems and their basic block diagram
Understand AR/VR industry perspectives and opportunities
Explain AR/VR core technology and discuss its applications

topics.title: Introduction to Organic and Inorganic Electronics
Biometric system
subtopics: Sensor module, basic building block of generic biometric system, database module, matching module

topics.title: Introduction to AR/VR - Industry perspectives and opportunities
AR/VR Core Technology, Experience and Applications

unitOutcomes.description: Understand the Block diagram of Raspberry Pi
Install Raspberry Pi OS on your SD card using Raspberry Pi Imager
Setup and configure Raspberry Pi computer
Interface LED, button and buzzer with Raspberry Pi
Interface PIR, temperature and humidity sensors with Raspberry Pi
Compare Types of machine learning techniques: supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning
Illustrate Python programming language, Python libraries like NumPy, pandas, keras etc. for data manipulation
Implement machine learning algorithms using machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn/TensorFlow

topics.title: Installation and setup of Raspberry Pi computer using Raspberry Pi imager on SD card
Control various electronic components using Scratch/python on the Raspberry Pi
subtopics: Buzzer and sensors: PIR, Temperature, Humidity

topics.title: Introduction to Machine Learning and its Types
Basics of Python for Machine Learning using libraries like NumPy, pandas, keras etc.
Introduction to ML tools for machine learning implementations

studentActivities: Prepare and submit a report on Renewable Energy Megaprojects (Large-Scale Solar and Wind Installations) of Smart City
Visit a nearby renewable energy power plant and report documentation.
Prepare a PowerPoint presentation on drone technology.
Prepare a PowerPoint presentation on advanced technologies in Electric vehicles.
Prepare a PowerPoint presentation on AR/VR.

microProjects.title: IoT sensors-based electronic circuits on renewable energy assets
microProjects.description: IoT sensors-based electronic circuits on renewable energy assets, such as solar panels and wind turbines, monitor performance, weather conditions, and maintenance needs

microProjects.title: Burglar Alarm using Raspberry Pi
microProjects.description: Design and implement a burglar alarm system using Raspberry Pi with sensors and alerts

microProjects.title: Line follower robot using Raspberry Pi
microProjects.description: Build a line following robot using Raspberry Pi and appropriate sensors

microProjects.title: Weather station using Raspberry Pi
microProjects.description: Create a weather monitoring station using Raspberry Pi with various weather sensors

microProjects.title: Image classification machine learning algorithm
microProjects.description: Train, test and implement image classification machine learning algorithm using machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn or TensorFlow

microProjects.title: Text classification machine learning algorithm
microProjects.description: Train, test and implement text classification machine learning algorithm using machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn or TensorFlow

microProjects.title: Sound classification machine learning algorithm
microProjects.description: Train, test and implement sound classification machine learning algorithm using machinelearningforkids/scratch/scikit-learn or TensorFlow

openSourceSoftware.name: Python
openSourceSoftware.description: Programming language for machine learning and IoT projects

programOutcomes.description: Basic & Discipline-specific knowledge: An applied knowledge of basic mathematics, science and engineering fundamentals and engineering specialization to solve the engineering problems.
Problem Analysis: Identify and analyze well defined engineering problems using codified standard methods.
Design/Development of Solution: Design solutions for well-defined technical problems and assist with the design of systems, components or processes to meet specified needs.
Engineering Tools, Experimentation and Testing: Apply modern engineering tools and relevant techniques to conduct standard tests and measurements.
Engineering practices for Society, Environment and sustainability: Apply relevant technology in context of Society, sustainability, environment and ethical practices.
Project Management: Use engineering management principles individually, as a team member or a leader to manage projects and effectively communicate about well-defined engineering activities.
Life-long learning: Ability to analyze individual needs and engage in updating in the context of technological changes.

developmentCommittee.name: Dr A S Pandya
developmentCommittee.designation: Principal BoS Chairman Electrical & Allied Branches
